data.name: Mega Man Zero Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The original soundtrack for Mega Man Zero has been remastered, complete with 25 tracks!
*Includes 9 tracks recorded specially for Mega Man Zero/ZX Legacy Collection!
*Includes art by official illustrator Toru Nakayama!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 336 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 496 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: MP3 (V0) + AAC (VBR) / FLAC (16-bit)
